channel.title: Help on creating npc's
channel.description: I am trying to create an npc to fight but i cant find the thing for it i know what npc # it is but what do i put for it. Like for the items its ::pickup itemid amount but what is it for npc's? PLease help

item.title: Help on creating npc's

item.description:
